name: InstallNetCoreRuntimeAndHosting
description: Downloads and installs the latest .NET Core runtime and hosting bundle.
author: Ronald Bosma

inputs.name: version
inputs.label: Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: Version of .NET Core to download and install.

inputs.name: useProxy
inputs.label: Use a proxy server
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enabling this option will make it possible to specify a proxy server address that will be used to download the installer.

inputs.name: proxyServerAddress
inputs.label: Proxy server address
inputs.helpMarkDown: The URL of the proxy server to use when downloading the installer. Needs to include the port number. Example: http://proxy.example.com:80

inputs.name: norestart
inputs.label: No restart
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enabling this option will pass the `/norestart` argument to the installer to suppress any attempts to restart.

inputs.name: iisReset
inputs.label: Perform IIS reset
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enabling this option will reset IIS after installation. The reset is recommended for all changes to take effect.
